member.name: T:DevTestGersztyn.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DevTestGersztyn.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DevTestGersztyn.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:DevTestGersztyn.CreateRequest
member.summary: The purpose of this class is to generate a SOAP request and pass it to the desired web service. Provides formatting and parsing for the XML. The resulting data from the request will be stored onto the machine's local database.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.CreateRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Manages the SOAP request and data processed within it.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.CreateRequest.GenerateRequestString
member.summary: Generate the request stream for this given request.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.CreateRequest.Execute
member.summary: Conducts a request to the webpage in order to receive the data from a HttpPOST. All set-up is conducted, resulting in an XML-based response.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.CreateRequest.CreateWebRequest
member.summary: Used to reate a SOAP webrequest to the given URL.
member.returns: A web request with the necessary header.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.CreateRequest.ParseXML(System.String)
member.summary: Extract the data we need to from the XML request. The data is then stored into a list.
member.param: The resulting XML request that is going to be parsed.

member.name: T:DevTestGersztyn.DataHandler
member.summary: A simple class used to handle connections to the local database.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.DataHandler.LoadData(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Populates the database with the data gathered from the SOAP request.

member.name: T:DevTestGersztyn.FormTrackingDisplay
member.summary: A basic application used to generate a SOAP web request. The application generates the request in the background and informs the user that data has been loaded. The user can request the data to be populated inside of the form by clicking the provided button.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.FormTrackingDisplay.MainForm_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the initial loading of the form. The main entry point of the application. Note that the form is generated only after the SOAP reqeust is completed.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.FormTrackingDisplay.TrackingDataGridView_CellContentClick(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)
member.summary: Generates the Data Grid to display tracking numbers.

member.name: M:DevTestGersztyn.FormTrackingDisplay.DisplayButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Display Data Button on the form. Once the button is clicked the data grid will be notified. Data from the database will then be populated.

member.name: T:DevTestGersztyn.ResultDatabaseDataSet
member.summary: Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.
